summary: The diff only modifies project_state.json, which is a planning/tracking file that records feature requests and their status. All requirements (REQ-1 through REQ-5) are listed in the project state as 'pending', meaning no actual implementation has been done. None of the frontend code changes required by the build request have been implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Activate the Lock and Unlock buttons in the AR camera view (CameraARActionBar) so that players can trigger lock and unlock coin interactions on visible AR spawn objects, with loading states and lock state persistence.
missing_requirements.reason: No frontend source files were modified. The project_state.json only records this as a pending feature request (AR-3) with status 'pending'.

missing_requirements.requirement: Enable monster rescue in the AR camera view with backend capture mutation, mockGameplayState update, SpawnCollectFX effect, and useGameplayHistory event.
missing_requirements.reason: No frontend source files were modified. The project_state.json only records this as a pending feature request (AR-4) with status 'pending'.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure Leaflet map spawn markers reflect lock state and monster rescue state from localStorage, with distinct visual styles for locked/captured states.
missing_requirements.reason: No frontend source files were modified. The project_state.json only records this as a pending feature request (AR-5) with status 'pending'.

missing_requirements.requirement: Move the footer visually higher on all pages by reducing bottom padding/margin without scrolling page content upward.
missing_requirements.reason: No frontend source files were modified. The project_state.json only records this as a pending feature request (AR-6) with status 'pending'.
